item.title: Websocket
item.description: Post under deployment Why you should use websocket? According to the book Websocket LightWeight Client-Server Communications: WebSocket gives you the ability to use an upgraded HTTP request (Chapter 8 covers the particulars), and send data in a message-based way, similar to UDP and with all the reliability of TCP.
